flawed_nl_solution:
There are 11 blue x 2 red/blue = <<11*2=22>>22 red balls.
The total number of blue and red balls is 11 blue + 22 red = <<11+22=30>>30 balls
There are 40 balls - 30 balls = <<40-30=10>>10 green balls.
